elements.text:
You and your friends took some pictures together. The next day, you get a notification that they tagged you in a post on social media. You don't like how you look in the picture.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I think that my friend could've posted a better picture, but I know they didn't really mean to put up a bad one of me.
It's nice they posted a picture of all of us.
I don't think anyone will care how I look.
Other people will judge how I look in the picture.
I don't think this is the best post, but it's just one picture and it's not a reflection of who I am.
